metadata.dc:title: The preservation in a good state of health
metadata.dc:description: In this work it is studied the books writed by spanish and french people over hygiene matter, these books were published in Spain in the second half of eighteen century and the first years of nineteenth century. It is also studied the politic sanitary measures adopted in Spain for the disinfection’s practice by Bernard Guyton de Morveau Baron’s method. This practices were very important in nineteenth century at first for making good health for spanish people and for thearmy too (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Francés Causapé, María del Carmen
metadata.dc:description: Se estudian las obras de higiene de autores españoles y franceses publicadas en España en la segunda mitad del siglo XVIII y principios del siglo XIX, así como las medidas de política sanitaria que se tomaron en España para la práctica de la desinfección por el métododel Barón Louis Bernard Guyton de Morveau, medidas que contribuyeron a mejorar el estado de salud de los españoles en el ámbito civily militar (AU)
metadata.dc:source: An Real Acad Farm;75(5,n.esp): 497-512, oct. 2009. ilus
metadata.dc:title: La conservación de la salud
